title: One-Timer
description:
“I’m pregnant.”
That’s what my teammate’s sister-in-law tells me after our one-night stand.I didn’t expect to see Hollis again, let alone end up raising a child with her.We set some ground rules—we’ll raise the baby together, but that’s it.No relationship, no future, and definitely no kissing.But the more time we spend together, the harder it is to keep track of where the lines were once drawn.I’m known for my one-timer on and off the ice, but this game with Hollis just got a lot more complicated…
author: Teagan Hunter
